nodes.text: The GT-33 Repair Drone was a model of maintenance droid used by the the Shroud, a freelance spy active during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. GT-33 Repair Drones were among the droid forces stationed at the Shroud's factory on the moon Nar Shaddaa.

GT-33 Repair Drones appear as enemies in the final macrobinoculars mission—"The Shroud Revealed" for Republic players and "All the Pieces" for Imperials— in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the 2011 BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
